TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GiveFeedbackEventHandler(object sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GiveFeedbackEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GiveFeedbackEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GiveFeedbackEventArgs)
public delegate void GiveFeedbackEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例假設有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用委派與事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the delegate with the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]
